00030 #define __HT32F5XXXX_AES_H

00033  extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #include "ht32.h"
00038 
00039 /** @addtogroup HT32F5xxxx_Peripheral_Driver HT32F5xxxx Peripheral Driver
00040   * @{
00041   */

00044   * @{

00048 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup AES_Exported_Types AES exported types
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * @brief  Definition of AES Init Structure
00055  */
00056 typedef struct
00057 {
00058   u16 AES_KeySize;
00059   u16 AES_Dir;
00060   u16 AES_Mode;
00061   u16 AES_Swap;
00062 } AES_InitTypeDef;
00063 /**
00064   * @}
00065   */
00066 
00067 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00068 /** @defgroup AES_Exported_Constants AES exported constants
00069   * @{
00070   */
00071 
00072 #define IS_AES(AES)                        (AES == HT_AES)
00073 
00074 /* Definitions of AES key size                                                                              */
00075 #define AES_KEYSIZE_128B                   ((u32)0x00000000)
00076 #define IS_AES_KEY_SIZE1(SIZE)             (SIZE == AES_KEYSIZE_128B)
00077 
00078 #if (LIBCFG_AES_KEYSIZE_256B)
00079 #define AES_KEYSIZE_192B                   ((u32)0x00000020)
00080 #define AES_KEYSIZE_256B                   ((u32)0x00000040)
00081 #define IS_AES_KEY_SIZE2(SIZE)             ((SIZE == AES_KEYSIZE_192B) || (SIZE == AES_KEYSIZE_256B))
00082 #else
00083 #define IS_AES_KEY_SIZE2(SIZE)             (0)
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 #define IS_AES_KEY_SIZE(SIZE)              (IS_AES_KEY_SIZE1(SIZE) || IS_AES_KEY_SIZE2(SIZE))
00087 
00088 /* Definitions of AES direction                                                                             */
00089 typedef enum
00090 {
00091   AES_DIR_ENCRYPT                    =0,
00092   AES_DIR_DECRYPT                    =2
00093 } AES_DIR_Enum;
00094 
00095 #define IS_AES_DIR(DIR) ((DIR == AES_DIR_ENCRYPT) || (DIR == AES_DIR_DECRYPT))
00096 
00097 /* Definitions of AES mode                                                                                  */
00098 #define AES_MODE_ECB                       ((u32)0x00000000)
00099 #define AES_MODE_CBC                       ((u32)0x00000004)
00100 #define AES_MODE_CTR                       ((u32)0x00000008)
00101 
00102 #define IS_AES_MODE(MODE) ((MODE == AES_MODE_ECB) || (MODE == AES_MODE_CBC) || (MODE == AES_MODE_CTR))
00103 
00104 /* Definitions of AES key start                                                                             */
00105 #define AES_KEYSTART_DISABLE               ((u32)0x00000000)
00106 #define AES_KEYSTART_ENABLE                ((u32)0x00000010)
00107 
00108 #define IS_AES_KEYSTART(KEYSTART) ((KEYSTART == AES_KEYSTART_DISABLE) || (KEYSTART == AES_KEYSTART_ENABLE))
00109 
00110 /* Definitions of AES swap                                                                                  */
00111 #define AES_SWAP_DISABLE                   ((u32)0x00000000)
00112 #define AES_SWAP_ENABLE                    ((u32)0x00000100)
00113 
00114 #define IS_AES_SWAP(SWAP) ((SWAP == AES_SWAP_DISABLE) || (SWAP == AES_SWAP_ENABLE))
00115 
00116 /* Definitions of AES flush                                                                                 */
00117 #define AES_FLUSH_DISABLE                  ((u32)0x00000000)
00118 #define AES_FLUSH_ENABLE                   ((u32)0x00000400)
00119 
00120 #define IS_AES_FLUSH(FLUSH) ((FLUSH == AES_FLUSH_DISABLE) || (FLUSH == AES_FLUSH_ENABLE))
00121 
00122 /* Definitions of AES Enable                                                                                */
00123 #define AES_DISABLE                        ((u32)0x00000000)
00124 #define AES_ENABLE                         ((u32)0x00000001)
00125 
00126 #define IS_AES_CMD(CMD) ((CMD == AES_DISABLE) || (CMD == AES_ENABLE))
00127 
00128 /* Definitions of AES status                                                                                */
00129 #define AES_SR_IFEMPTY                     ((u32)0x00000001)
00130 #define AES_SR_IFNFULL                     ((u32)0x00000002)
00131 #define AES_SR_OFNEMPTY                    ((u32)0x00000004)
00132 #define AES_SR_OFFULL                      ((u32)0x00000008)
00133 #define AES_SR_BUSY                        ((u32)0x00000010)
00134 
00135 #define IS_AES_STATUS(STATUS)              ((STATUS == AES_SR_IFEMPTY)  || \
00136                                             (STATUS == AES_SR_IFNFULL)  || \
00137                                             (STATUS == AES_SR_OFNEMPTY) || \
00138                                             (STATUS == AES_SR_OFFULL)   || \
00139                                             (STATUS == AES_SR_BUSY))
00140 
00141 /* Definitions of AES PDMA                                                                                  */
00142 #define AES_PDMA_IFDMAEN                   ((u32)0x00000001)
00143 #define AES_PDMA_OFDMAEN                   ((u32)0x00000002)
00144 
00145 #define IS_AES_PDMA(AES_PDMA)              ((AES_PDMA == AES_PDMA_IFDMAEN) || (AES_PDMA == AES_PDMA_OFDMAEN))
00146 
00147 /* Definitions of AES Interrupt Status                                                                      */
00148 #define AES_INTSR_IFINT                    ((u32)0x00000001)
00149 #define AES_INTSR_OFINT                    ((u32)0x00000002)
00150 
00151 #define IS_AES_INTSR(AES_INSR)             ((AES_INSR == AES_INTSR_IFINT) || (AES_INSR == AES_INTSR_OFINT))
00152 
00153 /* Definitions of AES interrupt enable                                                                      */
00154 #define AES_IER_IFINTEN                    ((u32)0x00000001)
00155 #define AES_IER_OFINTEN                    ((u32)0x00000002)
00156 
00157 #define IS_AES_IER(ARS_IER)                ((ARS_IER == AES_IER_IFINTEN) || (ARS_IER == AES_IER_OFINTEN))
00158 /**
00159   * @}
00160   */

00167 void AES_CBC_Init(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, AES_InitTypeDef* AES_InitStruct);
00168 void AES_CTR_Init(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, AES_InitTypeDef* AES_InitStruct);
00169 void AES_SetKeyTable(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, u32 *Key, u32 keySize);
00170 ErrStatus _AES_CryptData(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, AES_DIR_Enum dir, u32 *iv, u32 length, u32 *inputData, u32 *outputData);
00171 #define AES_ECB_CryptData(a, b, c, d, e)     _AES_CryptData(a, b, NULL, c, d, e)
00172 #define AES_CBC_CryptData                    _AES_CryptData
00173 #define AES_CTR_CryptData(a, b, c, d, e)     _AES_CryptData(a, AES_DIR_ENCRYPT, b, c, d, e)
00174 #if 0

00177 ErrStatus AES_CTR_CryptData(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, u32 *iv, u32 length, u32 *inputData, u32 *outputData);
00178 #endif
